name: Voltar
description: Voltar is a retro-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the prestigious WebtrES club. With a combination of a soldier's box body, foundry arms and legs, and a laser screen, Voltar stands out as a unique and powerful member of the club. Its design pays homage to the classic game consoles of the past, showcasing a blend of nostalgia and cutting-edge technology. Equipped with an impressive array of abilities and skills, Voltar is ready to take on any challenge that comes its way.
